_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three examples that occurred to the: The green, sappy log lying in water
The green, sappy log lying on dry land far from water
The dried up, withered log lying on dry land far from water
The teachings and trainings the Buddha p: Approaching Āḷāra Kālāma and realizing the teaching of the dimension of nothingness
Approaching Uddaka, son of Rāma, and realizing the teaching of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
Arriving at Senanigama and discovering a delightful park, leading to the three examples that occurred to the Buddha.
The group of five mendicants' realizatio: The group of five mendicants were advised and instructed by the Buddha
They soon realized the supreme end of the spiritual path in this very life
They lived having achieved with their own insight the goal for which gentlemen rightly go forth from the lay life to homelessness
The five factors that support meditation: Faith in the Realized One's awakening
They have good health and vitality
Achieving distinction in meditation [mn8: They could be instructed in the evening and achieve distinction in the morning
They could be instructed in the morning and achieve distinction in the evening
Prince Bodhi's refuge to the Buddha, the: The prince or princess in my womb goes for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, and the mendicant Saṅgha
This Prince Bodhi goes for refuge to the Buddha, to the teaching, and to the mendicant Saṅgha
Now for a third time I go for refuge to the Buddha, to the teaching, and to the mendicant Saṅgha
